SEARCH
Package domain

Class AManufacturing

java.lang.Object
domain.AManufacturing
public class AManufacturing extends Object
Class representing a manufacturing lattice where different types of Things can be placed. The lattice consists of a grid where various cells and other entities can be initialized and manipulated.

  • Constructor Details

    • AManufacturing

      public AManufacturing()
      Constructor for AManufacturing class. Initializes the lattice with null values and sets up the initial pattern of Things.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the size of the lattice.
      Returns:
      the size of the lattice.

    • getThing

      public Thing getThing(int r, int c)
      Retrieves a Thing from a specific position in the lattice.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index.
      c - the column index.
      Returns:
      the Thing at the specified position, or null if none exists.

    • setThing

      public void setThing(int r, int c, Thing e)
      Places a Thing in a specific position in the lattice.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index.
      c - the column index.
      e - the Thing to be placed at the specified position.

    • someThings

      public void someThings()
      Initializes some specific Things in the lattice. This includes cells, tourist cells, poison, and reflective cells.

    • initializePattern

      public void initializePattern()
      Initializes the lattice pattern with inactive original cells. Sets up a 10x10 sub-grid in the bottom-left corner with active cells.

    • neighborsActive

      public int neighborsActive(int r, int c)
      Counts the number of active neighboring Things around a specified position.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index of the target position.
      c - the column index of the target position.
      Returns:
      the number of active neighboring Things.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty(int r, int c)
      Checks if a specific position in the lattice is empty.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index.
      c - the column index.
      Returns:
      true if the position is empty, false otherwise.

    • inLatice

      protected boolean inLatice(int r, int c)
      Checks if the specified position is within the bounds of the lattice.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index.
      c - the column index.
      Returns:
      true if the position is within bounds, false otherwise.

    • ticTac

      public void ticTac()
      Performs a tic-tac cycle on all Things in the lattice. In each cycle, the Things decide their next state and then change their state accordingly.
